meanings: (좋아하여) like, love, be fond of, be attached to
(유행·의견·규칙 등을) follow, (충고 등을) act (up)on, (formal) heed, (규칙 등을) obey, comply (with), abide by, conform to[with]

vlive.korean: 돈을 따르지 않아도 돈이 따라올 것 같다고. Even if you don't follow money, money will come. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] JUN. K X Rooftop Live - 준케이​의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Even if you don't follow money, money will come.

vlive.korean: 사실 너의 깊은 말을 따르지 않았다면 '4시'는 '4시'가 아니었을 거야. - 응? Had I not followed your advice, the song wouldn't be "4 O'clock". - Huh? 듣기 View video BTS : R&V Live
vlive.english: Had I not followed your advice, the song wouldn't be "4 O'clock". - Huh?

vlive.korean: 한 잔 따라주시겠습니까? Can you pour me a cup? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Can you pour me a cup?

vlive.korean: [치이이익-] 따라야지~ I shall pour it into the glass. 듣기 View video TWICE : 트와이스 복자매 나모의 “도전! ASMR” EP.01
vlive.english: I shall pour it into the glass.

vlive.korean: 막내 말 따라야죠 - 알겠습니다! We have to obey the youngest. - Okay! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: We have to obey the youngest. - Okay!

examples.korean: She had discharged herself against medical advice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 의사의 충고를 따르지 않고 퇴원을 했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had discharged herself against medical advice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The building does not conform with safety regulations. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 건물은 안전 규정을 따르지 않고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The building does not conform with safety regulations. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He doesn’t conform to the usual stereotype of the businessman with a dark suit and briefcase. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 사업가 하면 짙은 색 정장에 서류 가방을 든다는 통상적인 고정 관념을 따르지 않는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He doesn’t conform to the usual stereotype of the businessman with a dark suit and briefcase. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In his art he broke the laws of scientific linear perspective. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자신의 예술 작품에서 과학적인 직선 원근법을 따르지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In his art he broke the laws of scientific linear perspective. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Pilot error, to wit failure to follow procedures, was the cause of the accident. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 조종사의 실수, 더 정확히 말하면 (조종사가) 절차를 따르지 않은 것이 그 사고의 원인이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Pilot error, to wit failure to follow procedures, was the cause of the accident. Add to Wordbook
